column3: â€œI rarely buy a strain without reading reviews on here first, but I think I'm the first person to review it, yay me! I'm really picky about taste, I prefer sweet, fruity strains. I have been suffering from back and hop pain for a few weeks and haven't found a good strain yet so this seems to be work...â€
